p: There are some studies on the development of microclonal reproduction technologies for H. officinalis. Stem tissue has been labeled as explants in the literature [ 62]. For bioreactor culture it was possible to use roots as an explant [ 60]. Among the sterilizing agents used for H. officinalis were Tween 20, 2% NaOCl [ 60], 0.04% HgCl2, 0.1% Tween 20 [ 62].
